name: 2022 3rd European Symposium on Software Engineering
content: Proceedings: Accepted papers of ESSE 2022 will be included in the conference proceedings with ISBN, which will be index by Ei Compendex, Scopus etc. SCI Journal: Selected papers after extention will be recommended to Mathematics (ISSN 2227-7390). Indexing: Scopus, SCIE (Web of Science), etc. Impact Factor: 2.258
